snippet.title: Bullet Casters - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page (demo available from february 21): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1838490/Bullet_Casters/

Itchio page: https://rokman.itch.io/bullet-casters

Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/qGUMBduvWy

------------------------

Bullet Casters is a unique mix of Shoot ‘em Up and Tower Defense where you can create your own bullet hell and challenge your friends.

 -DUEL MODE- 

In this local PvP mode a player has to conquer a castle by shooting down its gate, while the opponent has to protect it by summoning an army of monsters. In this demo there are 4 playable characters, each with his own shooting style and abilities, and 15 monsters with different attack patterns that can be combined to create a veritable barrage of bullets.

You can play Bullet Casters’ Duel Mode in 2 people with just a mouse and keyboard (gamepad is supported too!)

-CHALLENGE MODE- 

In the single-player Challenge Mode you will face short but intense levels that will test your skills and wits. Satisfy extra conditions, like clearing a challenge quickly or without taking damage, to get higher evaluations and unlock new monsters to summon in the Duel Mode.
